tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE emergency_contacts (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(50),
	phone_number VARCHAR(15),
	email VARCHAR(50),
	relation VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE emergency_contacts (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(255),
  address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE security_breaches (
  breach_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  breach_date DATE NOT NULL,
  description TEXT NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  contact_id UUID REFERENCES emergency_contacts(id)
);

CREATE TABLE emergencies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contact_name VARCHAR(50),
    contact_relationship VARCHAR(50),
    contact_phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    contact_email VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE incidents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    incident_description TEXT,
    incident_location VARCHAR(100),
    incident_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE responders (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    responder_name VARCHAR(50),
    responder_role VARCHAR(50),
    responder_contact_number VARCHAR(15),
    responder_email VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE notifications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    notification_type VARCHAR(50),
    notification_message TEXT,
    notification_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    notification_recipients VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE responses (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT REFERENCES incidents(id),
    responder_id INT REFERENCES responders(id),
    response_status VARCHAR(50),
    response_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    response_notes TEXT
)
